Content: Another step of the national program to provide Samurdhi benefits to 600 thousand families was launched in the Matale District today under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. 4,500 families were given Samurdhi benefits at |Kekirawa under the first phase in the Anuradhapura District. Expressing his views on the occasion Minister Daya Gamage said that the governmentâ€™s aim is to make Samurdhi recipients backbone of the country. Taking part on the occasion MP Chandima Gamage said that the opposition was working without responsibility regarding national security and the people.
